Elephants and other animals could walk freely without scraping their head on the ceiling—with plenty of room to spare . 隧道的地下迷宫里，罗马人保留着“他们能够带来的各种类型的外来动物”，包括犀牛和蛇。大象和其他动物可以自由走动而不让天花板刮到它们的头部——那里有着充足的剩余空间。

notice: to spare在句子中用作后置定语。

examples: To start with , his parliamentary majority was slim and depended on fickle coalition partners. 首先他在国会中取得大多数席位希望渺茫，而且这要依靠其不靠谱的合作伙伴。
Could we suggest a 20% reduction to the fee, together with the four weeks' extension to the campaign? 我们提议减少20%的费用，外加活动延长四周时间，可以吗？（听力/CET6，2011.12）
By the way, what about salary? I just hope it isn't lower than what I get now. 顺便问一下，薪水情况怎样？我希望不要比我现在的薪水更低。（听力/CET4，2007.12）
What if you can roll into a town and make artifacts that have a local flavor? 如果你进入一个小镇，做一些有当地特色的手工制品怎么样？
What is more , two-thirds of Chinese exports involve foreign brands, a good chunk of which are European. 而且三分之二的中国出口商品都是和外国品牌有关，其中很大一部分是欧洲品牌。

What is worse for India's poor is that overall inflation is being led by high food prices, especially the prices of protein items and also of vegetables, fruit and dairy products. 对于印度的穷人来说更糟糕的是高涨的食品价格导致了全面的通货膨胀，特别是那些含蛋白质的食物以及蔬菜、水果和奶制品的价格。

explains.explain: 毫不相关的；不中肯的；离谱的
examples: A veteran journalist, formerly with Newsweek , he seems most interested in the stories of diplomats and fellow hacks. They come off a bit better than their sightseeing countrymen, even if their early views were wide of the mark . 作为《新闻周刊》的前资深记者，他似乎对外交官和政治仆从的故事最感兴趣。即使他们早期的观点有些离谱，也比来观光的同胞稍好一点。

explains.explain: 逐字逐句地；一字不差地；精准地
examples: The census requires trainees to read word for word from a manual to conduct census operations, according to the memo. 根据备忘录的要求，这次人口普查要求受训者在执行人口普查任务时将手册上的内容一字不差地读出来。
Most women would sooner give up silk scarves or designer shoes than mascara or eye shadow, which they consider to be more essential. 大多数女士宁可放弃丝绸围巾或设计师品牌鞋子，也不会放弃刷睫毛膏或涂眼影，因为她们认为后者更为重要。
The beggar's shoes are worn out . 那个乞丐的鞋已经十分破旧了。
Your diligence is worthy of encouragement, but effort does not equal accomplishment. 你的勤奋值得鼓励，但是你的努力不一定会得到相应的成就。（阅读/CET6，2010.6）
